dmca.title: Great Wall of Copyright (#3)
dmca.body:
Dec. 28th, 2002

[private]
Xi'an International Studies University
Xi'an, Shannxi, 710061
People's Republic of China
    
Dear Google Editor, 

Hereunder, I, on behalf of Travelchinaguide.com, the property of Xi'an Diamond Network Co, Ltd., would like to notify you a [sic]copyright infringement with part of our website content.The copyrighted work at issue is [sic] the texts that appear on:

http:/www.travelchinaguide-com/attraction/tibet/nakchu/heavenly_lake.htm
    
              http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/sakya_monastery.htm

              http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/shigatse/tashihunpo.htm

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/sports/golf/xian.htm

http://wwww.travelchinaguide.com/aboutus.htm

Search queries and related infringing web pages that appear on the Google search result pages are listed below.

Search Query: namtso lake

Infringing Web Pages: www.travel-to-china.net/backdrop/spot/tibet_namtso.htm

Search Query: Sakya Monastery

Infringing Web Pages: www.travel-to-china.net/backdrop/spot/tibet_sakya.htm

Search Query: Tashilhunpo Monastery

Infringing Web Pages: www.travel-to-china.net/backdrop/sport/tibet_ tashilhunpo.htm

Search Query: Xi'an golf tour

Infringing Web Pages: www.travel-to-china.net/tours/golf.shx_gol_6_01.htm

Search Query: China personalized travel website about us

Infringing Web Pages: www.travel-to-china.net/about/about.htm

Since the plagiary [sic] has another site, www.toptrip.cc, which is actually a duplicate site of www.travel-to-china.net, the following pages also infringe our copyrighted work of the above listed pages. The following plagiary pages are in your index but did not show for the same Search queries.

http://www.toptrip.cc/destination/spot/tibet_namtso.htm

http://www.toptrip.cc/destination/spot/tibet_sakya.htm

http://www.toptrip.cc/destination/spot/tibet_tashilhunpo.htm

http://www.toptrip.cc/tours/golf/shx_gol_6_01.htm
    
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner,Travelchinaguide.com, its agent, or the law.

We can be reached at [private} or [private].

The plagiary [sic] can be reached at [private] or [private].

I swear, under penalty of perjury; that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
    
              Sincerely yours,
    
                [private]
    
              General manager
    
              Travelchinaguide.com
    
              Xi'an Diamond Network Co, Ltd.
